text: ajab eisaa abn maryam talab alhawariiyn fadaea rabah jl wela qayla rabana 'anzil ealayna mayidatan taeam min alsma', natakhidh yawm nzwlha eydana lna, nezmh nahn wman bedna, watakun almayidat elamt whjt mink ya allh ealaa whdanytk waealaa sidq nbwty, wamnhna min etayk aljzyl, wa'ant khayr alrazqyn
